typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENT_CREATIVE_ID as string,
		VIDEO_CREATIVE_ID as string,
		SUBMEDIA_ID as string,
		OPRODUCT_ID as string,
		LENGTH_V as string,
		ACTUAL_LENGTH_V as string,
		VIDEO_CREATIVE_S as string,
		TARGET_URL_S as string,
		START_WEBSITE_ID as string,
		FIRSTSEEN_D as string,
		CLASSIFICATIONTYPE_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 999999999,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(VIDEO_CREATIVE_S = left(VIDEO_CREATIVE_ID,254),
		TARGET_URL_S = left(TARGET_URL_S,999)) ~> trimmedCreativeS
trimmedCreativeS sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['trimmed_video_creative.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
